intro.title: Comprehensive Funeral Services
intro.subtitle: Every life is unique, and every farewell should be too. We offer a complete range of services to create a meaningful tribute that honors your loved one's memory.
intro.credentials: Professional Standards: As proud members of NAFD, SAIF, Association of Green Funeral Directors, and recommended by the Good Funeral Guide, we maintain the highest standards in funeral care. Our director David Barrington served as NAFD President 2019-2021 and is a NAFD Approved Tutor.

traditional.title: Traditional Funerals
traditional.description: Classic, dignified services following time-honored traditions. We'll help you create a respectful farewell with all the traditional elements your family values.

contemporary.title: Contemporary Celebrations
contemporary.description: Modern celebrations of life that focus on joy and remembrance. Create a unique farewell that truly reflects the person you're honoring.
features: Flowers from your loved one's garden

direct.title: Direct Cremation
direct.description: A simple, affordable option without a traditional service. Perfect for those who prefer a private goodbye or plan to hold a memorial later.

green.title: Green Funerals
green.description: Environmentally conscious options for those who lived sustainably. We offer various eco-friendly choices to minimize environmental impact, including our memorial tree planting service.
features: Memorial tree planted for every funeral

religious.title: Religious Services
religious.description: Respectful services honoring all faiths and beliefs. We work with religious leaders from all denominations to ensure traditions are observed.

home.title: Home Funerals
home.description: Intimate farewells in familiar surroundings. We can arrange for your loved one to rest at home before the funeral, allowing private family time.

stationery.title: Memorial Stationery
stationery.description: Order of service booklets, memorial cards, and thank you cards designed to your specifications.

floral.title: Floral Tributes
floral.description: Beautiful arrangements from local florists, including traditional wreaths and contemporary designs.

catering.title: Catering Services
catering.description: Reception venues and catering for the gathering after the service, from simple refreshments to full meals.

jewelry.title: Memorial Jewelry
jewelry.description: Keep your loved one close with fingerprint jewelry, ashes jewelry, and other memorial keepsakes.

streaming.title: Live Streaming
streaming.description: Allow distant friends and family to attend virtually with our professional webcasting service.

repatriation.title: Repatriation
repatriation.description: International transportation arrangements for those who pass away abroad or wish to be laid to rest overseas.

pricing.title: Transparent Pricing
pricing.subtitle: We believe in complete transparency. All our prices are clearly displayed, with no hidden fees or surprise charges.

essential.title: Essential Service
essential.description: Our simplest option, including all necessary arrangements and a basic coffin.

standard.title: Standard Service
standard.description: Our most popular package, including hearse, one limousine, and choice of coffin.

premium.title: Premium Service
premium.description: Complete service with additional vehicles, premium coffin, and extended viewing.

pricing.note: All prices include our professional fees, care of your loved one, and essential administration. Additional costs such as crematorium fees and celebrant charges are shown separately.
